attributes.action: Change law to require airlines operating in the UK to allow small pets in cabin
attributes.additional_details: As per previous petition, Government claimed it was up to airlines to decide in such matter. However, they mentioned we could start petition for Government to make it a law for airlines to accept pets in cabin
attributes.background: It took us two days to return via multiple transport means with puppy being on his own for 9 hours at one of the transport.This journey would take 3 hours if pets were allowed to be brought by plane in cabin into the UK.Putting them in Cargo causes trauma to pets  and costs £1,000 one way at minimum
